entries.name: Metallic Ancestry
entries: You trace your ancestry to a metallic dragon, granting you a special magical affinity. Choose one type of dragon from the Metallic Ancestry table. This determines the damage type for your other traits as shown in the table.

entries.name: Breath Weapon
entries: When you take the {@action Attack} action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of a magical energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes {@dice 2d8} damage of the type associated with your Metallic Ancestry on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 3d8}), 11th level ({@dice 4d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 5d8}).
You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Draconic Resistance
entries: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your Metallic Ancestry.

entries.name: Metallic Breath Weapon
entries: At 3rd level you gain a second breath weapon. When you take the {@action Attack} action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of a magical gas in a 15-foot cone. The save DC for this breath is 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. When you use this ability, choose one:

items: Each creature in the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 20 feet away from you and be knocked {@condition prone}.
Each creature in the area must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} until the start of your next turn.

entries: Once you use your Metallic Breath Weapon, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.
